title: Copilot CLI: Plan Before You Build, Steer as You Go
description: New reasoning models and intelligent workflow features for real-time conversation steering with improved planning capabilities.

community_feedback.quote: GitHub Copilot CLI 2026: Smarter Agents, Seamless Context Management, Simplified Installation
New features coming in January release are hot

title: Install Copilot CLI Directly from GitHub CLI
description: GitHub Copilot CLI can now be installed and used directly from the GitHub CLI via 'gh copilot' command.

community_feedback.quote: GitHub's official X account announced new Copilot CLI updates including new models and easier model management

title: Claude Code 2.1.14 - CLI Enhancements
description: New version 2.1.14 released with history-based bash autocomplete, plugin search by name or description, and pinning plugins to exact git SHAs.

community_feedback.quote: I was a top 0.01% Cursor user, then switched to Claude...

title: Copilot CLI v1.x - /review Command Added
description: Added /review command to analyze code changes, made session event messages more concise, and cleaned up old package versions during installation.

community_feedback.quote: Context length increased in copilot cli

title: Version 1.5.35 Stable Release
description: New stable release with improvements for TUI mode as in-sync coding agent and headless mode for async cloud agents.

title: Device-Code Auth for Headless Environments
description: Added device-code auth as standalone fallback in headless environments along with various bug fixes.

title: Version 1.5.35-beta.20260120
description: Beta release with continued optimization for rapid iteration and responsive coding workflows.

title: CLI Agent Modes and Cloud Handoff
description: Major CLI update introducing Plan Mode and Ask Mode for coding tasks, cloud handoff for background task offloading, and one-click MCP auth. Hooks performance improved 10-20x.

community_feedback.quote: I moved from Cursor to Claude Code (CLI). Here is what I learned about Sub-agents & Hidden Costs
People still using Cursor over Claude Code

title: Version 2.12.2 - JetBrains Plugin
description: Updated JetBrains plugin with improved file search performance and fixed diagnostics downloading issues when changing file names.

title: Richer Agent Controls and Collaboration Events
description: New release includes real-time collaboration tool events, richer agent controls with spawn_agent roles, and interruptible send_input functionality.

title: Plan Mode and Ask Mode
description: Mid-January update brought Plan Mode to map out approach before coding, and Ask Mode to explore codebases without making changes.

title: Agentic Memory Public Preview
description: Agentic memory feature now in public preview that gracefully handles Copilot running without a repository.

community_feedback.quote: GitHub Copilot Now Remembers Your Codebase

title: Copilot CLI Enhanced Agents and Context Management
description: Enhanced agents with improved capabilities, better context management for more relevant suggestions, and new installation methods.

community_feedback.quote: GitHub Copilot CLI: New features from late-December to early-January discusses enhanced agents, context management

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Generally Available
description: GPT-5.2-Codex model is now generally available in GitHub Copilot.

title: Version 1.13.6 - Code Integrity Layer
description: New Code Integrity layer integrated with Secure-by-Default update, plus Agent Skills for Cascade AI coding agent. GPT-5.2-Codex integration available with reasoning effort levels.

title: External Editor Support and Branching Threads
description: Versions 0.78.0-0.80.0 released between January 6-9 with external-editor editing (Ctrl+G), project-aware config, and branching threads.

title: Active Users API Endpoint
description: New API endpoint GET /v3beta1/enterprise/metrics/active-users for retrieving unique active users for custom date ranges.

title: Claude Code 2.1.0 - Major Release with 1,096 Commits
description: Massive update with 16 major changes including automatic skill hot-reload, forked sub-agent context for skills/commands, clickable hyperlinks for file paths, async sub-agents, and session teleportation capabilities.

community_feedback.quote: Claude-Code v2.1.0 just dropped with automatic skill hot-reload and support for running skills in non-project directories
